name: MonsterVille
description:
Welcome to MONSTERVILLE, a farming-simulator RPG hybrid about Maxwell, a sleep-deprived college student. He wakes up on what seems to be a typical day ㅡ but in reality ㅡ this day would be very different. It's early in the morning, and he's walking to his college campus. Suddenly, a yellow beam shoots down from the sky and strikes Maxwell, knocking him unconscious. He wakes up on a secluded island that people call MONSTERVILLE!

"What's there to do?" Well, allow me to answer that question! In this game, you can...

  •  EXPLORE various dungeons and caverns!
  •  FIGHT tons of scary enemies and spooky bosses.
  •  BUILD decorations and furniture.
  •  CUSTOMIZE the island to your heart's content!
  •  CRAFT different items to aid you in your journey!
  •  GROW stronger as you progress throughout the game!
  •  EQUIP various armor sets, accessories and weapons.
  •  BEFRIEND unique and wacky characters!
  • ...and much more!

For now, please enjoy the DEMO available as a download below. Currently, the game works with WINDOWS ONLY; Mac/Mobile ports will be made if there is enough demand. Also, please note that this is NOT the full game! This game is still under active development and will someday be available as a paid release.

Please send me an email at harlanx.business@gmail.com if you encounter any bugs. Include a detailed bug report along with an image/video if applicable.

That's it from me! Thank you SO much for reading this! 

I hope you enjoy this game! Take care. :)

- HarlanX
